  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1980</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading strategies:Understanding Titles.Par t2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">T2 des Messwert strategies:Understanding 
Titles.Par</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">T2 De la Lecture strategies:arrangement Titles.Par</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">T2 da leitura strategies:Understanding Titles.Par</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">T2 della lettura strategies:Understanding 
Titles.Par</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">T2 ισοτιμίας τίτλων ανάγνωσης 
strategies:Understanding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">T2 de la lectura strategies:Understanding 
Titles.Par</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet which requires the student to understand the meaning behind a Title and to answer questions about its relation ship to text. Includes translation of the titles into hebrew too.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interpretation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, der den Kursteilnehmer 
benötigt zu verstehen, daß die Bedeutung hinter einem Namen und 
Fragen über seine Relation zu beantworten zum Text versenden. 
Schließt Übersetzung der Namen in Hebräer auch ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau qui exige de l'étudiant de 
comprendre que la signification derrière un titre et pour répondre 
à des questions au sujet de sa relation se transportent au texte. 
Inclut la traduction des titres dans l'hébreu aussi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha que requeira o estudante 
compreender que o meaning atrás de um título e para responder a 
perguntas sobre sua relação envía ao texto. Inclui a 
tradução dos títulos no hebrew demasiado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro che richiede 
all'allievo di capire che il significato dietro un titolo e rispondere
alle domande circa il relativo rapporto spedisce a testo. 
Include la traduzione dei titoli in ebreo anche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας που απαιτεί το 
σπουδαστή για να καταλάβει την έννοια πίσω από έναν τίτλο και 
για να απαντήσει στις ερωτήσεις για το σκάφος σχέσης του στο 
κείμενο. Περιλαμβάνει τη μετάφραση των τίτλων στα εβραϊκά 
επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una hoja de trabajo que requiere a 
estudiante entender que el significado detrás de un título y 
contestar a preguntas sobre su relación envíe al texto. 
Incluye la traducción de los títulos en hebreo también.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesestrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stratégies de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estratégias da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interpretação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategie della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interpretazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρατηγικές ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερμηνεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrategias de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interpretación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
